meanings.definition: To take away or eliminate something
meanings.sent1: She was removing the weeds from the garden.
meanings.sent2: The teacher is removing the incorrect answers from the test paper.
meanings.sent3: The magician was removing rabbits from his hat, one after another.
meanings.sent4: The detective was removing layers of lies to uncover the truth.
meanings.sent5: The chef skillfully demonstrated removing the bones from the fish.

meanings.definition: The act of taking something away or off of something else
meanings.sent1: The removing of the old wallpaper took hours.
meanings.sent2: His job involves the removing of debris from construction sites.
meanings.sent3: The removing of the cake from the oven filled the kitchen with a sweet aroma.
meanings.sent4: The removing of the mask revealed his true identity.
meanings.sent5: The removing of the obstacles allowed for smooth progress.
